content.body: I'm wondering about Abstract Closures in a post-2547 spec. E.g. CreateListIteratorRecord defines a closure that uses `?`, so it can return an abrupt completion. So when it says `Return *undefined*`, should that  be `Return NormalCompletion(*undefined*)`?

content.body: Or should the closure have a return-type, so that the `NormalCompletion()` is implicit?
